channel.title: Run Error: Java can't find main class?
channel.description:
I have already begun styling my server. I can do the basics such as editing items, npcs, spawns, etc. I continued by editing item stats stuch as Red Partyhat has 1000 stab bonus, and that went fine, but while messing with more stuff i saved and came across this error
Sorry for no image,
it reads through command prompt:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 12 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList<ItemHandler.java:381> at server.world.ItemHandler.<init><ItemHandler.java:33> at server.Server.<clinit><Server.java:61> Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue...
Because my server works fine and the quote ".loadItemList" I know that it has to do with the Item.cfg file.
If you have come across this before or you have the solution help is greatly appreciated, Thanks

item.title: Run Error: Java can't find main class?
item.dc:creator: @run_moneygod run moneygod
item.description:
@run_moneygod wrote:

clearly states errors
at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemListItemHandler.java:381

itemhandler.java line 381 i would get notepad ++ for this btw

at server.world.ItemHandler.ItemHandler.java:33

again itemhandler.java line 33

at server.Server.Server.java:61

server.server=server.java so
server.java line 61

post what they are and ill get bk 2 you

Read full topic
